parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.16

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Register objects which can be edited by a curator.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> curatorObj [[addCuratorEditableObjects]] [objects, addCrew]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> '''curatorObj''': [[Object]] - Curator module.

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> '''objects''': [[Array]]
 
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> '''addCrew''': [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>MyCuratorModule [[addCuratorEditableObjects]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>MyCar], [[true]]<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3: Curator]], [[allCurators]], [[removeCuratorEditableObjects]], [[curatorEditableObjects]]
</value></part></template>


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on July 23, 2020 - 10:29 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:R3vo|R3vo]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
To continuously make all created objects editable for all Zeus use the following code:
<code>[[if]] [[isServer]] [[then]]
{
  [] [[spawn]]
  {
    [[while]] {[[true]]} [[do]]
    {
      {
        _x [[addCuratorEditableObjects]]
        [
            [[entities]] [[],["Logic"],[[true]] /*Include vehicle crew*/,[[true]] /*Exclude dead bodies*/],
            [[true]]
        ];
      } [[count]] [[allCurators]];
      [[sleep]] 60; [[a / b|/]]/Change [[to]] whatever fits your needs
    };
  };
};</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
